profile:
Since 1989 Titan Construction has been a leader in home construction and renovation services. 
Built on excellent customer service, high quality product, and innovative project design, Titan Construction is a trusted choice when considering any scope of home construction services.  
We specialize in all areas of home and office renovation including basement finishing, kitchen and bathroom remodeling, stucco, siding, and roofing, as well as home repairs. 
Titan Construction also performs restoration and repair work for victims of fire, flood and other insurable perils. 

Our main goal is to provide outstanding customer service and high quality work at affordable prices. 
We have acquired a formidable reputation over the last 27 years as one of Edmonton’s finest renovation and restoration companies. 
All our work is scheduled and overseen by expert Project Managers and is backed by our extended 10-year structural guarantee.

Please call 780-483-3426

profile:
At Clean Cut Carpentry, our mission is to provide the best customer satisfaction and quality of work through education, experience and partnerships. Our vision is to be an industry leader in home projects through customer service, reliability, integrity and work ethic. Our unique emphasis on education and experience helps us to provide you with dynamic services in order to complete projects to exceed your expectations. 

Preston, the owner, has been in the construction industry for over 10 years, been Red Seal Certified since 2016, and has worked on both small and large commercial and residential projects. His attention to detail and extensive knowledge of the industry is shown in his excellent quality of workmanship. This is shown by his reliability and punctuality in completing the project, his honesty and integrity in explaining the intricacies of the project process, and dedicated hours of labour to complete the project.

We are proud to service Edmonton and surrounding areas in quality home renos and projects with everything from decks with custom lighting to Interlocking stone pavers, fences, custom concrete and interior renos. We offer free estimates and marketing discounts to help you make us your first choice in contracting. 

Check out our new Instagram Page! https://www.instagram.com/cleancutcarpentry19/

profile:
Home Renovations In Edmonton & Surrounding Areas
Do It All Contracting Ltd is Edmonton’s leading home renovation and general contractors in Edmonton, operating in the Edmonton area for over 23 years. Since 1997 we have specialized in high-quality custom home renovations, basements, kitchens, bathrooms, exteriors & commercials for hundreds of residential and commercial clients.

Best of Houzz 2020 Service Award
The team at Do It All Contracting Ltd prides themselves on helping all of our clients with any renovation project they might have. Our clients have continued to support us by giving us the most positive reviews in the home renovation and remodeling industry and our testimonials speak for themselves. Whether you are looking for a qualified general contractor in Edmonton, basement development, or a home renovation expert, our Edmonton office has been offering these services since 1997 all complete with a 2-year warranty.

When you come to Do It All Contracting for your custom home renovation solutions we can help guarantee that your renovations or development are completed professionally within your budget. We pride ourselves on helping all our clients with any size project – no job is too small, we do it all! We service Edmonton, St. Albert, Morinville, Sherwood Park, Spruce Grove and surrounding areas.

TrustedPros Reviews
Benefits Of Hiring Do It All Contracting For Home Renovations
Attention To Detail
Sometimes all it takes is to think out of the box to create an interesting detail. With the experience of handling multiple projects of various types, Do It All Contracting can help you give a new dimension to your house or business. Even the smallest change done with attention to every detail can create magic. A third person’s perspective can be useful in most of the remodeling projects.

Right Tools For The Job
All the tools that are needed for restoration and home improvement projects would be available with us. With the right tools, you can easily obtain precise results, and in a short time.

No Project Is Too Small
No project is too small. We consider every custom home renovation project that comes our way the same way. Having handled homes small and big, we help you create the best restoration solution that works well for your space.

Professional Assistance
Experimenting with different materials and designs becomes easy when you have our professional assistance. Depending on the budget, we make it possible to get the best solution for significantly altering the looks of your home. Therefore, you do not have to postpone your renovation plans due to budget constraints. We have a team of general contractors Edmonton that can help you every step of the way, with building, design or any other assistance you need.

Stress-Free Experience
Do you have the time to get the job done? That should be the big question that bothers most homeowners. We take the load off your shoulders and simplify even the most complicated projects and save your time. Sometimes homeowners start a small home improvement project only to leave it as a work-in-progress task for days or months. In your busy schedule, we let you leave aside worries about completing the home update job and spend quality time with your family instead. While you focus on other priority tasks, we take care of the whole refurbishing job without any hassle.

Satisfied Customers
From saving a lot of time to focusing on the perfection of the output for long term benefits, there are several such perks to depending on us for professional residential & commercial renovating services. We’ve been in business since 1997 and have an impeccable record with the Better Business Bureau (BBB). We have a long list of satisfied customers in Edmonton, St. Albert and surrounding areas.

bathroom with tub and walk in shower
Don’t stress over home renovations
100% Commitment-Free Quote

Free Estimate
Why Should You Stress About Home Renovations?
There are various types of home improvement jobs that can improve the value of your property If you have plans to sell your investment any time soon, then some significant updates tasks can strongly increase the home value. If you plan to let out your house on rent, then such projects can increase the possibility of fetching better rental rates. This also makes it easy to find buyers or tenants for the house. Houses that look chic and in good condition are the ones with the best resale value and rental value in the market.

Home Renovations That Can Boost Your Home Value
 Kitchen Renovations
 Basement Renovations
 Bathroom Renovations
 Exterior Renovations
The above projects instantly make your property feel more alive and also attract potential buyers when you plan to resell your home. These are also some of the most popular projects for which homebuyers approach us.

We start with clearly understanding your objectives, and then we come up with suggestions that fetch the best value for your money. If you have a clear idea of what you want and only want some professional assistance in the implementation of the ideas, we can help with that too. End to end solutions or small level modifications, we take care of all kinds of projects that can make your home or office feel more personalized and more like ‘your’ space. With the transparent workflow, we follow it is easy to work even if it is your first time working with professional renovators. Get clear estimates and then decide how and when you would like to proceed with the project. You can also have a plan fully tailored to meet your budget requirements. Our team of professionals can help you every step of the way.

With being in business for over 20 years, we have a vast amount of knowledge and experience in any renovation project. Take a look at some testimonials from our past clients on TrustedPros, Houzz and Google. Proudly servicing Edmonton, St. Albert, Morinville, Sherwood Park, Spruce Grove and area. We provide full service to Edmonton AB and surrounding areas. Phone us for a 100% commitment-free estimate.

profile: Looking to build a new house or give your current home a facelift? Hire a professional general contractor in Edmonton who is ready to help with bathroom renovations, kitchen remodeling, basement renovations or a complete home restoration. The team at 99 North Renovations can build anything from home additions, new kitchens, bathrooms, decks and patios. We finish basements, knock down walls, create new spaces and reinvent homes by adding new life by way of creative craftsmanship with honest pricing. Our experience in this industry means we accurately understand how much things cost, which trades people offer the best quality services and once we have selected your team, we will negotiate prices with your best interest in mind. Browse our website and learn about the many ways we can help you reduce construction costs, increase home value and complete construction jobs the right way while being on time and within your budget.

Garage Builder,

At Ronnex Garages, we are committed to creating custom-built garages in Edmonton. We specialize in custom built quality garages at affordable prices. Founded in 1975, Ronnex Garages is a name you can trust. At Ronnex Garages it is our goal to build every garage as if it were our own. We take pride in our work and it shows.
